text: This conversation started with a request to post the IP address of a proxy server, which was then used to connect to an API endpoint using PostgREST. The test revealed that the Librarian REST API is now available at `https://api.complexsimplicityai.com`.
content:
ASSISTANT: **Done.**

`api.complexsimplicityai.com` → PostgREST (100.110.82.181:3333)

Caddy reloaded. Test it:

```bash
# Via domain
curl https://api.complexsimplicityai.com/

# List tables
curl https://api.complexsimplicityai.com/memories?limit=3

# Query core_identity
curl "https://api.complexsimplicityai.com/memories?namespace=eq.core_identity"
```

**Librarian REST API is live at https://api.complexsimplicityai.com**
